title: Prohibits the discharge of a firearm or long bow within 1000 feet of a school or school playground
summary: Prohibits the discharge of a firearm or long bow within 1000 feet of a school or school playground; increases the distance which hunters may hunt near schools from 500 feet to 1,000 feet.
